website_summaries.verdict: Tasty bars with healthy ingredients for a price that's a bit lower than competitors – their quality and value make them the best pick for your money.
pros: Generates praise for the pleasant texture and taste in addition to the nutritious ingredients including oats, nuts, and fruits
Also a good source of fiber
cons: Some consumers noted the flavor is too sweet
Rare reports of crumbled bars upon arrival
High in sugar and processed ingredients
More like a fortified candy bar

website_summaries.verdict: The original Clif Bar still shines amidst its new competitors. A healthy and flavorful snack perfect for on-the-go.
pros: Packed full of natural ingredients such as nuts, dried fruits, oats, and more
These original bars are dense and chewy – similar to a good cookie, but without all the added sugar
A filling snack that can be used as a meal replacement, or simply to hold you over between meals
cons: Bar should be consumed with a drink, as it can dry out your mouth

customer_reviews.title: Yummy taste and my go to snack on the go - Great for busy moms!
customer_reviews.text: Clif bars are one of my FAVORITE protein bars, and I have tried many! For comparison, I also love Luna bars and hate Lara bars. Taste is PRETTY YUMMY - prob due to the fact that the number one ingredient in syrup (wish they didn't put so much sugar)... but rolled oats comes second so it's not toooo bad... It does have that taste of protein powder, but it's not overwhelming at all. These are one of my go to snacks to put in my purse and have on the go - especially as a busy mom who is always starving. These are a good deal to buy on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: kateoh

customer_reviews.title: Tasty flavor
customer_reviews.text: The peanut butter honey & sea salt is a great flavor. It’s not too salty but has a good hint of salt to it. This and gingerbread are my two favorites. Good deal on the larger pack here too because they’re hard to find in stores every time I shop it all seems to be chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmm tasty.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I suddenly can't handle lactose anymore so did a search for lactose free protein bars and ta-dah!!! These bars are delicious and I could eat 3 a day if they weren't so pricey. But most decent protein bars cost a little more so no complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Robb

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have been eating Clif bars for years now. Tried a few of their flavors, don't really like their chocolate too much but then again I am not a big chocolate person. But this one, this is awesome. great balance of sweet and salty. I have bought several boxes of these and it is now my favorite flavor
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Awful!
customer_reviews.text: Small bars and yet 23 grams of sugar! There is no taste of caramel toffee whatsoever. These are by far the worst tasting things I've ever had in a protein bar. I am going to have to throw them all out. These are in no shape or form a healthy bar!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Can't speak too much to the health benefits of any protein bar but Clif makes some of the most satisfying bars in my opinion. Honestly can't tell much difference between this version ("salty") and the regular peanut butter version but it tastes good and makes for a nice post-workout snack. I also keep a few of these in a bugout bag.
customer_reviews.author: Beef5718

customer_reviews.title: I Keep A Drawerful!
customer_reviews.text: For a long time I kept a drawer of mainly Nutz Over Chocolate in my desk drawer, but recently switched to the Chocolate Chip bars. I sometimes get other flavors to mix in, but always Luna or Clif - great taste, not too sweet and a pleasingly chewy consistency. First thing at work I get a cup of hot tea brewing and reach for a Clif bar, then the hectic day begins. I guarantee you I keep track of reordering!
customer_reviews.author: Flint Springs

customer_reviews.title: Check label before purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing, something was changed cause it taste nothing like the original Clif Bar. An at 21 grams of sugar it’s more like a candy bar than a energy bar. If you feel like spiking your blood sugar eat a few of these !
customer_reviews.author: NetWorkPro

customer_reviews.title: Wife likes it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife. She likes them so I do too. Not that she shared any.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn P Bowman

customer_reviews.title: They might be heavy in your stomach.  I find they are too sweet and Heavy.
customer_reviews.text: I find these to have way too much sugar and total calories per bar. Makes me a bit bloated. These are not health bars, but more of an energy bar when you are rock climbing or roofing a house for 12 hours and need a solid balanced meal in a bar.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Happy Joy joy

customer_reviews.title: Expired
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pack of these to make my deployment just a little bit better by enjoying some food I enjoy eating at home, but when it arrived to my location, it was past the expiration date. I understand it takes longer to ship here, but had it gotten here at an earlier time, it still would have almost been expired and I would have had to eat it all right away. I was highly disappointed. :(
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like Cookie Dough!
customer_reviews.text: I was given one of these to try after a race and fell in love with them. I searched the grocery stores trying to find the right flavor but had no luck and then found this on amazon and was extremely pleased. They are a bit high in sugar, but the taste is so worth it. I feel like I am eating candy or cookie dough, but I am getting a load of protein at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Amyfromga

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor and size
customer_reviews.text: I have never been a fan of clif bars while in the military, they were just too available and had little gain compared to other products available at the time. Now however they provide a decent meal replacement, although not designed for this. I can eat a meal....being somewhat larger than most bars. This helps me feel full instead of lacking. Decent flavor, not exactly health food but worth a look at.
customer_reviews.author: L. McNerneyTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Love these bars, but not my favorite flavor.
customer_reviews.text: So much cheaper buying in bulk on Amazon! I rarely eat breakfast, so having these on hand is great to tide me over till lunch. I go through them so much I always have a few flavors on hand, this is probably my 3rd favorite. Peanut Butter Crunch is first, blueberry bring second. For a healthy natural bar, these are full of flavor, not a nasty dry consistency, and fill you up.
customer_reviews.author: Rich M

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor snacking bar!
customer_reviews.text: My first time buying any food items from amazon but I was surprised to see that they still have 16 months until they expired. I checked my local store which had 9 months to expire. Great snacks for the outdoors. Great energy boost but be sure to drink your water after! Eat it slow its not a snickers haha.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Jankins

customer_reviews.title: Favorite flavor
customer_reviews.text: Sticky gooey and very caramel-ey. Don’t taste the salt so much which is normally important for a sodium addict like me who usually cringes at the thought of sweets but the flavor is too good, one of these bars and a glass of milk or cold water fills me right up and satisfies me. Best flavor clif has to offer by far, followed closely by the crunchy PB:)
customer_reviews.author: User739156420

customer_reviews.title: Too Much Sugar!
customer_reviews.text: 21g's of sugar per bar? Wake up Clif! I would hope it tastes good with that much sugar.
customer_reviews.author: DDinNTK

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and value
customer_reviews.text: These are some of my go-to Clif bars. This flavor is usually cheaper than the others, but it's also one of my favorites. It's pretty sweet, sort of like a hearty chocolate chip cookie, but it provides a nice energy boost on trails or a morning pick-me-up. I'm a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Chutuk

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are super sweet....like candy bar sweet, so they didn't work very well for me pre-gym. They taste great and have the usual Clif Bar quality.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Bar On!
customer_reviews.text: These "good food" bars are delicious and at this price, of great value! Shipped to a young man at Marines boot camp at his request -- he views them as one of the healthiest snacks and a welcome departure from military rations so we are making sure to provide this treat in abundance!
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I don't like to eat early in the morning, but I can't take all my pills on an empty stomach. These bars are great to get some nutrition and get something tasty in my tummy to take my meds. This is my favorite flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Ammann (Lillie)

customer_reviews.title: Smooth New Clif Barf
customer_reviews.text: This newest addition to the Clif Bar Family is delicious, fragrant and perfectly packaged!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah H Cantu

customer_reviews.title: Expired and overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The Cliff Bars ordered were over priced but this was the only seller who offered the product desired. They were supposed to be sent overseas to my nephew however they are expired. Not pleased at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Gardynecki

customer_reviews.title: Good bars... if you get them all
customer_reviews.text: Overall, good tasting bars that satisfy. However, I ordered a package for 12 Chocalte Chip Clif bars, only to come home, open the amazon box, and find the box of Clif bars already open halfway. I was then concerned about all 12 bars not being in there, and sure enough, not all of the bars were there. Small issue that may be at the fault of Amazon, but makes a difference in my buying decisions moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Little Too Sweet For My Taste
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that this flavor wouldn't be as sweet with the addition of the sea salt, but unfortunately it's just too sweet for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Staple, Cheaper and Delivered
customer_reviews.text: These are a staple in our household when the teenage athlete needs quick healthy energy before practice and has no time for a meal. A Clif bar and a piece of fruit will do it. Most of the flavors have way too much sugar for him though. The least sweet are the Chocolate Chip and the Chocolate Chip Peanut Butter, so these are the only kind we get. That said, ordering them by the box from Amazon is WAY cheaper than buying singles, or getting the boxes at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: WingedMaud

customer_reviews.title: yummy bars, easy carry and filling!
customer_reviews.text: Will hold you over for hours - excellent taste and portability.
customer_reviews.author: choc

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely delicious. They remind me of chocolate chip oatmeal cookies. Probably not the most healthy option, but when eaten for breakfast, they keep me full until midday.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Just not as sweet as I was hoping for; more of a chemical taste to me.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Eichel

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting quick energy
customer_reviews.text: I get these for my picky and busy college student children. They love the taste and great for a quick bit between classes. They just stick in their backpacks with now fear of melting.
customer_reviews.author: Celia B. Lerner

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend Peanut Butter & Honey with Sea Salt
customer_reviews.text: For everyone that loves the peanut butter flavor, the peanut butter and honey with sea salt takes that to the next level. Hard to find in stores, but this seller is on point. Delicious, filling, great post workout. I highly recommend you give this new flavor a try.
customer_reviews.author: William S

customer_reviews.title: Made me constipated
customer_reviews.text: Made me constipated. Had to use a stool softener after my last rock climbing trip to Denali
customer_reviews.author: White Lightning

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat this price.
customer_reviews.text: Best price out there for this! I don’t have a sweet tooth but I need an energy boost in the day, this is perfect. Came super quick, will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stale!!!
customer_reviews.text: I normally love these, but every time I’ve ordered them from Amazon, they’re hard and stale. The chocolate chips even have that dusty white look that chocolate gets when it’s old.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: My two teenage sons grab these as they race from place to place. I've tried all kinds of healthy on-the-go foods, but nothing has gotten the consistently positive reaction Clif Bars have. Unsurprisingly, Chocolate Chip is their favorite, and where it might not be the ideal health food, it beats the vast majority of the competition hands-down! The price is right, too...trying to feed what is often a household of teenage males can sometimes feel like it requires a second mortgage; having a box or two of Clif Bars on hand helps quell the the loud, hungry beasts at a decidedly reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Simply delicous
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several of the Cliff bars and most are ok but not great. This was is delicious!! Sweet, salty and peanut butter! I will be re-ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly West

customer_reviews.title: My favourite flavour of bar
customer_reviews.text: I used to be a chocolate chip Clif bar apologist, but no more. This is the new king of flavours. I was never really into sweet things, so this dark chocolate and salt bar really hit the more bitter and savory tastes that I crave when I'm on the run or just feeling like a cheeky nibble. Honourable mentions: mint chocolate chip and chocolate almond fudge.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Best flavor yet!
customer_reviews.text: Clif's best flavor yet! Perfect for a quick breakfast on the go that keeps me full minter than other energy/protein bars.
customer_reviews.author: KW314

customer_reviews.title: Extremely delicious and good for the soul—oh wait that’s me!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great! I order these in bulk; great for a quick pick-me-up. I keep one packed on me at all times just in case I get dizzy/hungry at work. Also I had a bad habit of feeling the need to eat right before bed (I work random hours at a theme park so keeping an eating schedule is dang near impossible) otherwise sleep was not an option; I just have one of these instead which is not the best option but it’s better than a full meal at night. I’m overall very happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Ezra

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I love these too much! They are chewy and full of chocolate chips. They have a decent amount of protein. They are the only thing I eat that contain sugar besides small amounts found in other foods. This is my only vice!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Light

customer_reviews.title: Sucker for these!
customer_reviews.text: Love Clif but they need to find something that isn't peanut butter to be a primary ingredient, which I don't blame them for at all. Delicious but I'm getting sick of pb
customer_reviews.author: WLH

customer_reviews.title: Expired in 5 days
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the delivery and not the product. My package was delivered Aug 21 and expired Aug 26. I was eating one of the bars and it tasted pretty stale, so I decided to check the expiration date only to discover it WAS old. I cancelled my subscription.
customer_reviews.author: focus000

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Both of my kids play travel ball and sometimes there isn’t time in between to have something to eat that isn’t completely junk. So I keep these in my snack bag to give to the kids in between games.
customer_reviews.author: funformom

customer_reviews.title: May order again in winter lol I live in Texas.
customer_reviews.text: First time I ordered everything came perfect! They were delivered around noon. Second time I ordered, they were delivered later in the day 6-7. And they came melted. Wonderful price and extremely convenient. But I may have to continue purchasing locally for freshness.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Rendon

customer_reviews.title: They taste very good
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because I do a lot of hiking. They're very easy to carry don't take up a lot of room in my backpack and they pack a lot of energy. I would recommend them for all hikers. Rich
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: College care package
customer_reviews.text: This order was a multiple item package for a college student: Computer screen wipes, several different snack candies. I was satisfied with all products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just another candy bar with too much sugar.
customer_reviews.text: I planned to order the protein bar but got the energy bar instead. I would not give any candy bar a rating higher than one. I gave these away.
customer_reviews.author: live to hunt

customer_reviews.title: excellent price. my kids love these bars
customer_reviews.text: the bars are packed with protein for energy. my kids absolutely love the chocolate chip and the chocolate brownie ones. And the price was 60% less than in health food stores. Wow!!! Great product for the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: keys,,

customer_reviews.title: Love Clif Bars
customer_reviews.text: I eat so many of these, especially the Chocolate Chip flavor. I just added them to subscribe and save so I can always have them around.
customer_reviews.author: Banana Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Got a bad batch..
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been eating Clif bars for years and this was by far the worst box I’ve ever gotten. This isn’t a new flavor for me either... each and every bar tasted like damp soil (musty). Must’ve been a bad batch, but I didn’t open it until the return period ended which was well within the expiration date.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Lot of energy in a small package
customer_reviews.text: My kids introduced me to these bars. There is a lot of energy in these small bars, enough that one bar, for me at least, is as filling as a mid-day meal. I've used them on hikes, and in places were I knew lunch options were limited. No refrigeration required, easy to pack. They are quite chewy, so if you don't like chewy food, then you may want to pass on these. Due to college and grad school schedules, my kids eat them frequently, preferring these over junk food to go.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Russell

customer_reviews.title: Not the best flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Sweet and salt flavor tasted really artificial, gave them away instead of eating them.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Picky eaters favorite granola bar
customer_reviews.text: Only granola bars my son actually wants. Great tasting and not too sweet. Recommend to buy online as in store is usually $1.25 a bar or $1 on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: great taste
customer_reviews.text: very good and new taste the honey is strong. but very good balance and very good bar overall
customer_reviews.author: Check Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good product very tasty
customer_reviews.text: Great product great tast very addictive I love these things good price considering they cost 1.99 apiece in the stores
customer_reviews.author: Arnold M.

customer_reviews.title: Supper Yummy Meal Replacement
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely enough to keep me full especially when I am in a hurry and can't stop. Life savers to keep in your office drawers just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate fix without the sugar!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a chocoholic, and was not expecting to like these, but they are SO GOOD!! Excellent sub for a candy bar! Just ordered my second box!
customer_reviews.author: tmcs

customer_reviews.title: Watch Your Wasteline
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious energy bars, but I don't get energy from them. They caused me to gain weight. If I need energy I take caffeine tablets. But they are tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Casan

customer_reviews.title: Tasty snack
customer_reviews.text: I love these things! These are great for an energy boost when you need something fast! They are delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: These are so yummy I'm surprised how good they taste
customer_reviews.text: These are so yummy I'm surprised how good they taste. I love that they're made of with rolled oats and I don't cause me to bloat. Makes a great fast breakfast in the morning
customer_reviews.author: Awsomegal

customer_reviews.title: Finest Quality Energy Bar
customer_reviews.text: One of the best energy bars I have tasted. Great texture, serving size was ample for a hardy snack while hiking
customer_reviews.author: James Williamson

customer_reviews.title: An actually-edible protein bar
customer_reviews.text: My kids take these to school as an extra snack when they are participating in after school activities. They tried several other protein bars but this brand (and this particular flavor) is the only one they'll actually eat. Good energy, with a texture that's not unappealing like many other nutrition bars. Also not bad to grab on your way out of the house when you're running late!
customer_reviews.author: LegoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Way too sweet
customer_reviews.text: These bars are way to sweet. Not really a protein bar but a small dessert bar.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Curry

customer_reviews.title: Hahahah great for selling
customer_reviews.text: Army approved. These are a most in basic if your SIT is allowed them. Hahahah great for selling, trading, and eating.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely dependable snacky wholesomeness
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff -- by far my favorite energy bar brand. The highlight here is the fresh grainy goodness of their secret blend of mostly soy and rice -- it's a little bit chewy, a little bit crispy, 100% edible. But obviously, the kickers are the chocolate chips, which add a dash of luscious sweetness to these, my favorite CLIF flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Teh Arbitrageur

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I always try to find a good breakfast bar and CLIF is always my go to! This is a good way for me to get some protein into my day, I enjoy the sweet and salty combo! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: A.Gonz

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, fresh and delivered quicky
customer_reviews.text: I sold these and customers loved these and wanted more
customer_reviews.author: Thaiville

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and filling.
customer_reviews.text: These bars are tasty and filling. They are good to grab and go when you don't have time for a meal or have a long stretch in between meals. With subscribe and save, they are also a great price compared to buying individually at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Same as the ones you buy at grocery store
customer_reviews.text: Same great Clif bars that you buy from the grocery store. Came in a box all together. Would order again!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Buy it local pls
customer_reviews.text: Somehow I get a feeling that this is not as good as what I get from the local market. Nor exactly sure what’s the difference. But it tastes not as good. As the price is similar, go to a local market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expiring too soon
customer_reviews.text: I order these to take back overseas with me so I can have good snacks when travelling and camping. Ordered 3 cases in May, but expiration date is August 16, 2019, Nov 28, 2019, and 5 Jan, 2020. Amazon is getting cheap sending out quickly expiring food products. Totally unacceptable. Last time I ordered the expiration dates were all close to a year out, which is what I was expecting this time.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Morton

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Overall, just not as sweet as I had hoped. Tasted a bit more chemical than I had hoped
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Eichel

customer_reviews.title: First time buyer review
customer_reviews.text: I have never bought these before, so I want sure what to expect. They are great. They are sized just right. Very tasty and filling.
customer_reviews.author: YBA

customer_reviews.title: Better than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Actually bite into Blueberries. Awesome! Some larger almonds used in this bar, not my favorite nut, However I know I'll eat the whole box. Delicious for a thick and dense protein bar! I've never had a fruity one before. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KayJay

customer_reviews.title: Staple clif bar - tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Staple clif bar - tastes great and is pretty nutritious less the sugar. Check the other flavors for a lower price if you’re not picky.
customer_reviews.author: Jarred Payne

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hiking bar, not much to say if you know Clif, if not, then it's a must try.
customer_reviews.author: SardonickTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Good brand
customer_reviews.text: These are good & I eat them in between meals to hold me over
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Filling and taste good
customer_reviews.text: These taste good and are great on a long hike or bike ride. They give me energy and fill my stomach. They are a bit dry, so make sure you have water with you. Amazon had them for a much better value than the local grocer.
customer_reviews.author: Acton Bell

customer_reviews.title: Clif Energy Bar- Chocolate Chip
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my 94 year old Mother. She is famished after her Monday and Wednesday swims so the Energy Bars keep her satisfied until she gets home to eat lunch. She loves them and and takes the edge off of her hunger during her ride home.
customer_reviews.author: 31Vickyslady

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Bars
customer_reviews.text: This is one of our favorite bars! Been buying it for several years now.
customer_reviews.author: The Chetu

customer_reviews.title: Great for pre workout
customer_reviews.text: Being diabetic, and loving working out, these bars have been a perfect solution. 1/2 bar before class gives me enough carbs for the class. If the class is a private, then one bar works just fine. And they taste great.
customer_reviews.author: James Mann

customer_reviews.title: Cliff Bars - excellent snack
customer_reviews.text: Cliff Bars arrived in good condition, the same ones buy at the local store - but at a lower price and a larger quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Beverlee Kutner

customer_reviews.title: expired
customer_reviews.text: These were delivered on March 15 and expired on March 6. I didn't realize until after I ate a few and can no longer return. You lost a longterm customer.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Carotenuto

customer_reviews.title: Yum, yum
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste of these. It's like eating a candy bar.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pauly

customer_reviews.title: Love these bars either by themselves or as a supplement with a light meal. Great bars.
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars either by themselves or as a supplement with a light meal. Great bars.
customer_reviews.author: highlandhoh3

customer_reviews.title: Great Bars
customer_reviews.text: Need more protein. I'm a regular consumer of Clif builder bars as well, but these are the classic flavor. Just wish the macro levels favored protein more on these.
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by these. Getting chocolate sea salt is hit and miss. These are quite good and an adequate substitution.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bade

customer_reviews.title: These bars come really handy when I’m hiking/running and hungry ...
customer_reviews.text: These bars come really handy when I’m hiking/running and hungry or tired. They give me the energy I need and feed my hunger.
customer_reviews.author: adan zarate

customer_reviews.title: Everything I bought them for and more
customer_reviews.text: Amazing taste, gives me energy and abates hunger. They could only be better if they helped me win the lottery! Delicious, and I am a repeat customer!
customer_reviews.author: SMP007

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and helps with digestion
customer_reviews.text: They are really tasty, perfect work milk or coffee for breakfast on the run and they have an effect on the body a vigorous morning walk would, if you get my meaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amy  S.

customer_reviews.title: We love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: We love this stuff. it's fully integrated in our diet as a mostly vegan gf household. Concentrated nutrition foods come with added risks.. for example, are contaminates more concentrated? Are nutrients present as promised? using this review as a platform to remind manufacturers that we trust what they're doing and we're feeding this stuff to kids. Please be vigilant.
customer_reviews.author: akamenth

customer_reviews.title: Overall great
customer_reviews.text: Buying in bulk they are a good price. Pretty good taste. Not good for the carb conscious though.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Taste nasty
customer_reviews.text: I didnt like the flavor or texture of these. Bought them for my trip to Vietnam and china (just in case I didnt like the food)
customer_reviews.author: J. Yuen

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy these bars that are convenient, healthy, and tasty snacks. This is one of my favorite flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Ammann (Lillie)

customer_reviews.title: Fan of Clif Bar for years!
customer_reviews.text: Have to have it for breakfast almost everyday! Otherwise Nuts and seeds are my go to before work!
customer_reviews.author: Russell L.

customer_reviews.title: Okay if youre starving
customer_reviews.text: These are okay but are chewy and not very tasty. I keep them at work for use when I'm busy and don't have time to go to lunch. They can satisfy hunger but it like eating chewy cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Dee

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: We really love these Clif Bars. I have a Clif bar every day for breakfast. They are convenient, a decent source of protein, and most of all non-dairy. They taste great (my favorite is the peanut butter but I like all of them).
customer_reviews.author: C. Therien

customer_reviews.title: Subscribe & Save Worthy
customer_reviews.text: Liked enough that it was requested to be placed on the subscribe & save.
customer_reviews.author: FlaGaLine

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet...
customer_reviews.text: Wish it wasn't so sweet. I find most products to be more sweet than necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Seestar27

customer_reviews.title: Great snack for in between meals when I need them
customer_reviews.text: Great snack for in between meals when I need them. Easy to carry with me for emergencies as I am a diabetic and need something quick at times.
customer_reviews.author: GeoDob

product_meta.title: CLIF BAR - Energy Bars - Chocolate Chip - (2.4 Ounce Protein Bars, 12 Count) (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description:
Flavor:Chocolate Chip

Born on a 175-mile bike ride and purposefully crafted with great-tasting, wholesome, and sustainably sourced ingredients, CLIF BAR energy bars have been fueling world-class competitors and everyday athletes for more than 25 years. Today, CLIF BAR remains the ultimate performance energy bar, delivering an optimal blend of plant-based protein, fat, fiber, and carbohydrates to sustain active bodies. It also contains a unique blend of fast-acting and longer-lasting carbohydrates from organic sugar and rolled oats to help fuel up before or during activity. As part of Clif Bar & Company’s commitment to making products that are friendly to people and the environment, CLIF BAR is also non-GMO, with no high-fructose corn syrup or artificial flavors.
feature_bullets: The classically craveable taste of a freshly baked chocolate chip cookie.

NUTRITION FOR SUSTAINED ENERGY: CLIF BAR is the ultimate performance energy bar, purposefully crafted with an ideal mix of protein, fat, and carbohydrates to sustain active bodies before and during long-lasting, moderate-intensity activity.

INGREDIENTS THAT ARE BETTER FOR THE PLANET: As part of our mission to help create a healthier, more sustainable food system, we make every bar with sustainably sourced chocolate and plant-based ingredients like almonds, peanuts, and organic rolled oats.
DELICIOUS FLAVORS, ENDLESS VARIETY: Satisfy any taste with a dazzling array of craveable CLIF BAR flavors, including classic favorites like Chocolate Chip and Crunchy Peanut Butter.
ENERGY ON THE GO: Whether you need sustained energy for hiking, climbing, skiing, or a long bike ride, CLIF BAR delivers wholesome, delicious energy that’s all wrapped up and ready to go.
